visible_files.makefile:
run.tests.output : makefile run.tests
	./run.tests

run.tests : makefile *.cpp *.hpp
	g++ -std=c++11 -Wall -Werror -O *.cpp -o run.tests
visible_files.instructions:
Spell out a number. For example

      99 --> ninety nine
     300 --> three hundred
     310 --> three hundred and ten
    1501 --> one thousand, five hundred and one
   12609 --> twelve thousand, six hundred and nine
  512607 --> five hundred and twelve thousand,
             six hundred and seven
43112603 --> forty three million, one hundred and
             twelve thousand,
             six hundred and three

[Source http://rosettacode.org]
